name: Rellor
flavorText: This Pokémon creates a mud ball by mixing sand and dirt with psychic energy. It treasures its mud ball more than its own life.

previous.name: Scovillain
previous.flavorText: The red head converts spicy chemicals into fire energy and blasts the surrounding area with a super spicy stream of flame.

next.name: Rabsca
next.flavorText: The body that supports the ball barely moves. Therefore, it is thought that the true body of this Pokémon is actually inside the ball.
